author: Emer Shelley
title: Why everyone over 70 should cocoon during Covid-19 crisis
description: Remember RTÉ reporter Teresa Mannion’s broadcast during Storm Desmond in 2017? She begged us all to stay at home. That would protect ourselves but it would also protect the emergency responders, who would need to come to our rescue if we were injured. In the …
content:
Remember RTÉ reporter Teresa Mannions broadcast during Storm Desmond in 2017? She begged us all to stay at home. That would protect ourselves but it would also protect the emergency responders, who would need to come to our rescue if we were injured.
